General.Name: Grupo Concesionario del Oeste SA
General.Description: Grupo Concesionario del Oeste S.A. engages in the construction, improvement, repair, conservation, expansion, remodeling, maintenance, administration, and exploitation of the Western highway in Argentina. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
General.Address: Av. De Mayo 645, Buenos Aires, Argentina
